page.title: 11Religion
page.content: The religions represented in Halvergate and Tunstall are Church of England and Methodist. The Anglican vicar, the Rev. Raymond F. Gibson, is also responsible for Beighton, Moulton, Freethorpe and Wickhampton. Services are held twice a month at Halvergate church. There are two other churches in the survey area, both redundant, at Tunstall and Moulton. The Methodist circuit minister for Acle, the Rev. Stephen J. Robinson has care of the survey area. There is a chapel at Halvergate to which people from Tunstall attend, where a service is held each Sunday, and a Bible Study group monthly. There is also a Sunday School for the children. Both clergymen have a close association with Halvergate primary school and take assembly once a month.
